Join our Team

MiCasa is a fast growing, cloud-based software company, providing an online solution for the sale of new-home upgrades.

We are looking for smart, talented people passionate about challenging the status quo.

We believe in hard work, lifelong learning, and having fun; all with the goal of changing the real estate industry. If that sounds like your kind of opportunity check out the open positions below.
